column4: Hi, I've just installed 9.10 on an eeepc 1005ha. After installing the backports alsa driver the microphone works, but it is really extremely weak. Any ideas on how to fix this?
change mic volume?
not that simple :) it's on max
i have the same exact problem
no mic after i first change the volume from mixer
I have mic, just very low. It stays low even if I plug an external mic. It was ok in Jaunty
clean install?
yep
tab
were you able to solve it?
the low volume issue
not yet
can't find nothing on it on the web either
which app you using for mic
empathy?
skype and voice recorder
no i don't think i know the solution
well, thanks anyway
another thing that's strange is that there isn't anywhere to pick the input device
not in alsamixer and not in the gnome applet
did you manage to fix the mic low volume problem?
i have not used it with empathy but in pidgin its working fine
